data.feedback: Plan comprehensively covers all 4 user requirements (Sharing UI, Goals UI, Native Integration, Real-time Client). File references are accurate - verified by reading actual codebase. Plan correctly identifies placeholder data issues that need fixing. Follows existing Clean Architecture and BLoC patterns perfectly.

issues.description: iOS/Android health permissions already exist in native config files
issues.impact: story-health-1 will require less modification than planned - not a blocker

suggestions: Update story-health-1 to note that iOS Info.plist already has NSHealthShareUsageDescription
Update story-health-1 to note that AndroidManifest.xml already has health permissions
